headline: UBS cuts PG&E to ‘neutral’ on lack of catalysts, wildfire risks
summary: Investing.com -- UBS downgraded PG&E (NYSE:PCG) Corp to Neutral from Buy saying there is a lack of catalysts and increased wildfire-related risks. Brokerage lowered its price target to $19 from $22, reflecting a 30% discount to the utility sector average.
